com.bassintag.tekengine.object.scene

Class TekScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.TekObject
      • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.scene.TekScene

  • public abstract class TekScene
extends TekObject
    TekScene.java created for TekEngine Represents a game scene, for example a menu or an ingame scene
    Since:
    03/12/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Antoine
